description:
Scissor Now!, Junglefowl and Laserbeams of Boredom are teaming up to provide the denizens of the 8 Ball Saloon with all the holiday cheer they could stand for absolutely free! If that's not enough, cheap beer and even cheaper whiskey will also warm your holiday cockles.

Scissor Now!
Http://scissornow.bandcamp.com 

Junglefowl
Http://junglefowl.bandcamp.com 

Laserbeams of Boredom
https://laserbeamsofboredom.bandcamp.com
name: Scissor Now! Ф Junglefowl Ф Laserbeams of Boredom

description: This holiday season, every time you buy one of our Lucky's Market products, 10% of the profits go to Community Action Network (CAN) of Ann Arbor to provide food for families who need some extra help. Look for the red L throughout the store to get products that are a great value, taste great, have no artifical colors, preservatives, or flavors, and give back to the community at the same time. This program runs from November 9th through December 14th, so mark your calendars and thank you for helping us make Ann Arbor a great place for everyone!
name: 10% For Good for Community Action Network

description:
Books and brews are a-go! Sweetwaters Westgate (inside the renovated Ann Arbor District Library West Branch) will be open and ready for families, friends, and Sweetwaters fans Tuesday, September 6 at 9am with a GRAND OPENING PARTY Sunday, September 18 at 12noon.

The GRAND OPENING PARTY will include two live concerts, a ribbon cutting, a Chinese Lion Dance, and refreshments!  Check out http://www.aadl.org/node/345699
__________________________

TUESDAY,  SEPT 6
Lucky guest #100 will win FREE coffee or tea for a year!
&
Buy any Triple drink get a free mini pastry, (while supplies last)

WEDNESDAY, SEPT  7
FREE cute mini Cold Brew for the first 30 guests starting @ 9am.

THURSDAY, SEPT 8
All day, buy any Triple drink get a free mini cookie! (while supplies last)

FRIDAY, SEPT 9
Precious little mini Cold Brews, FREE for the first 30 guests starting @ noon.

SATURDAY, SEPT 10
All day, buy any Triple drink get a free mini dessert! What could it be?! (while supplies last)

SUNDAY, SEPT 11
BOGO cards (to use at that time or next purchase) especially for the first 50 guests starting at opening & then again for the first 50 guests starting at 4pm!

MONDAY, SEPT 12
Buy any Triple drink get a free mini dessert, until 3pm
&
THEN for the first 40 guests starting at 3pm, FREE mini Cold Brew! The perfect afternoon pick-me-up!
__________________________

Stay tuned for updates! Invite your fellow Sweetwaters enthusiasts <3
name: Sweetwaters Westgate Grand Opening!

description: Join our longtime friends and November Brewery of the Month Founders Brewing Co. for this Thanksgiving Eve tasting- cheers!
name: Brewery of the Month- Founders Brewing Co

description:
Trapped in the theater with a ghostly bartender, you have one hour to illuminate the mysteries and escape!

Adventure Lab is a new business specializing in escape rooms and other live-action puzzle games. If you enjoy puzzles, fun, adventures, games, or improving your small group communication skills, then you won't want to miss this unique event at Pointless!

Select the time and date you would like to attend. Each time slot is limited to 3-6 people.
Adventures are:​
Wednesday, November 23 @ 2 pm
Wednesday, November 23 @ 4 pm
Wednesday, November 23 @ 6 pm
name: Ghost Light (An escape room adventure)

description:
Join us for the release party that started it all as we tap our infamous Terminator Dopplebock! At 8% ABV, Terminator topped the list as our highest gravity beer for years. Our winter lager is perhaps our most famous beer, though no longer the strongest. Like all traditional German Dopplebocks it is richly spicy with a subtly sweet malt palate and a clean, crisp, dry hop finish.

ABC is continuing our commitment to Terminate Hunger in Washtenaw County with our partnership with The Breakfast at St. Andrew's. $1 from each Terminator sold will be donated to the the Breakfast at St. Andrew's.

Launched in 1982 by a handful of volunteers, today, the Breakfast at St. Andrew's serves between 90 and 150 meals daily. More than 100 volunteers, donate their time on a regular basis. Every morning from 7:30 to 8:30 a.m., the welcome guests who come for a hot meal and to pack a sandwich lunch for later in the day. Guests include the young and old. They arrive as individuals or in groups. Some are homeless or struggling with addiction or mental illness, but most are working men and women who are trying to make ends meet in a difficult economy. As a non-profit organization, the Breakfast at St. Andrew's is the only program in the Ann Arbor community serving a meal without charge, every day at the same time and place. http://breakfastatstandrews.org/about-us.htm

Live music graciously provided by Ryan Racine.
It's been a twenty-plus year journey for Ryan Racine to get to where his music finds itself. Recording for the first time as a solo artist and writing without what he refers to as "the shackles of genre", the direction is really a culmination of the variety in his past projects. The sound is still very much grounded in American Roots music but is unbound by the narrow concepts he has applied to previous outings. www.ryanracine.com

This event is open to the public and donations are encouraged.
name: Terminate Hunger Release Fundraiser

description:
Join us Wednesday, November 23rd from 5pm–12am, to celebrate our 3 year anniversary! We've got some specials in store for you!

$3 Sangria

name: Aventura Ann Arbor 3 Year Anniversary Celebration
